channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 3rd October
item.description:
Some furniture has been fly-tipped at this location three days ago, and it has not been collected since. Additionally, the street rubbish has not been cleared, and foxes have torn open the bags, spreading waste all over the pavement. This is creating an unsanitary and unpleasant environment for residents and passersby. Could you please arrange for an urgent collection and cleaning of the area? Its at post box infront of mems corner cafe 124 Cheltenham road se15 3ar

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Cheltenham Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car abandoned. No tax or MOT., 3rd October
item.description:

item.title: These bis signs keep appearing on lamposts, 3rd October
item.description:

item.title: Multiple lights not working, 3rd October

item.category: Light in park or open space

item.title: Litter and urine, 3rd October
item.description:
Man pulled up outside our flat, emptied all the rubbish from all doors of his car onto the floor and then urinated on the floor and drove off. Plate GY67 KOX

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brownswood Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
